G

getColor() - Method in class GmmlColor
This method returns a Color that awt can use
getColorFloat() - Method in class GmmlColor
This method returns a color in the format of a float[3] with r,g,b stored in it.
getHelpers(double) - Method in class GmmlArc
Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the arc, which are used to drag and transform the arc.

Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the brace, which are used to drag and transform the brace.

Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the label, which are used to drag and transform the label.

Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the line, which are used to drag and transform the line.
getHelpers(double) - Method in class GmmlLineShape
Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the lineshape, which are used to drag and transform the lineshape.
getHelpers(double) - Method in class GmmlShape
Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the shape, which are used to drag and transform the shape.
getPathway() - Method in class GmmlReader
 
GmmlArc - class GmmlArc.
This class contains the arcs.
GmmlArc(double, double, double, double, String, double) - Constructor for class GmmlArc
Constructor GmmlArc has 4 doubles for the coordinates and a string for the color as input.
GmmlBrace - class GmmlBrace.
This class contains the braces.
GmmlBrace(double, double, double, double, int, String) - Constructor for class GmmlBrace
Constructor GmmlBrace has 4 doubles for the coordinates, an int for the orientation and a string for the color as input.
GmmlColor - class GmmlColor.
This class takes care of colors given as a string-gmml format.
GmmlColor() - Constructor for class GmmlColor
Create an empty GmmlColor
GmmlColor(String) - Constructor for class GmmlColor
Create a new GmmlColor and store the color in it, note that if the string is an invalid gmml color string it will result in black.
GmmlDrawing - class GmmlDrawing.
 
GmmlGeneProduct - class GmmlGeneProduct.
This class contains the gene products.
GmmlGeneProduct(int, int, int, int, String, String) - Constructor for class GmmlGeneProduct
Constructor GmmlGeneProduct has 4 ints for the coordinates, a string for the geneID, and a string for the reference as input.
GmmlLabel - class GmmlLabel.
This class contains the labels.
GmmlLabel(int, int, int, int, String, String, String, String, int, Color) - Constructor for class GmmlLabel
Constructor GmmlLabel has 4 doubles for the coordinates, 4 Strings for the text, the font, the font weight and the font style, an int for the font size and a color object for the color as input.
GmmlLine - class GmmlLine.
This class contains the lines.
GmmlLine(double, double, double, double, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class GmmlLine
Constructor GmmlLine has 4 doubles for the coordinates, 2 ints for the type and the style and a color object for the color as input.
GmmlLineShape - class GmmlLineShape.
This class contains the lineshapes.
GmmlLineShape(double, double, double, double, int, Color) - Constructor for class GmmlLineShape
Constructor GmmlLineShape has 4 doubles for the coordinates, an int for the type and a color object for the color as input.
GmmlPathway - class GmmlPathway.
GmmlPathway creates the objects geneProducts, lines, lineshapes, labels, arcs, braces and shapes.
GmmlPathway() - Constructor for class GmmlPathway
 
GmmlReader - class GmmlReader.
 
GmmlReader(String) - Constructor for class GmmlReader
 
GmmlShape - class GmmlShape.
This class contains the shapes.
GmmlShape(double, double, double, double, int, String, double) - Constructor for class GmmlShape
Constructor GmmlShape has 4 doubles for the coordinates, an int for the type, a double for the rotation and a color object for the color as input.
GmmlVision - class GmmlVision.
The GmmlVision class is basicly the Graphic User Interface of the program as you see when you open it.
GmmlVision() - Constructor for class GmmlVision
Create a new program window.
GmmlWriter - class GmmlWriter.
The GmmlWriter class build a jdom document from a given pathway.
GmmlWriter(GmmlPathway) - Constructor for class GmmlWriter
The constructor will load the pathway and automaticly build a document of it.
